items.sentence: Parents want their children to get a good education.

Tom sat on a park bench, watching people walking by.

Tom and Mary say that mosquitoes don\'t bother them.
The only one here who doesn\'t like swimming is Tom.
It\'s quite clear that Tom doesn\'t want to be here.

I don\'t think that Tom should go back to Australia.
